什么意思_英语tumultuous在线翻译... ... Tumultuous Strength 级 Tumultuous Endeavor 拼争 xiōngxiōng tumultuous 恟恟.
they gave a tumultuous reception in honor of the guests .他们为客人举行了喧闹的招待会。
he said businesses and alike were struggling to contend with tumultuous markets and a financial-services industry under siege .他表示，企业和消费者正艰难应对动荡的市场和深陷困境的金融服务业。
